# List of awards and honours received by Mustafa Kemal Atatürk

Portrait taken in 1918 with his awards
This is a comprehensive list of honours and awards of Mustafa Kemal Atatürk ( – 10 November 1938) who was a field marshal, revolutionary statesman, and founder of the Republic of Turkey as well as its first President.
